SMW Subobject for Version 1NPC location: Digsite and near Varrock MuseumUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 3628Examine: This person is working on the site.Release date: 9 July 2003Image: File:Digsite workman (1).pngIs members only: trueIs variant of: Digsite workman

The Digsite workmen can be found in and around the Digsite, as well as carrying rocks to the Varrock Museum. They can also be pickpocketed, giving 10.4 Thieving experience if successful.

They play an important role in The Dig Site quest as one may steal an animal skull from them. Also, players who come to work at the Digsite without the necessary tools can pickpocket the workmen and eventually gain most of the items needed, although this can take some time.

Contents

  • 1 Pickpocketing info
  • 2 Changes
    • 2.1 Gallery (historical)
  • 3 Trivia

Pickpocketing info[edit | edit source]

Digsite workman
Level required 25
Thieving XP10.4 xp
TypePickpocket
ToolNone

Notable about these workmen is that pickpocketing takes roughly twice as long to execute, compared to other pickpocketable NPCs. Interestingly, workmen give coins when pickpocketed, instead of coin pouches.

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Coins101/11; 4/11[d 1]1010
Specimen brush13/11Not sold0
Rope11/116910
Bucket11/1181
Leather gloves11/11403
Spade11/111061
Animal skull13/11; Never[d 2]Not sold0
  1. ^ After completion of The Dig Site, coins become more common.
  2. ^ After completion of The Dig Site, the animal skull drop gets replaced by 10 coins.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • A worker will exclaim Oi! What do you think you're doing? There's fragile specimens around here! when digging with a standard spade in soil.
